sentences.en: As autumn approached, the plants and colours in the garden changed.
sentences.cn: 秋天临近，花园中的草木和颜色也发生了变化。

sentences.en: For law students, autumn brings the recruiting season.
sentences.cn: 对学法律的学生来说，秋季是招聘旺季。

sentences.en: Gucci will be holding fashion shows to present their autumn collection.
sentences.cn: 古奇将举办时装发布会推出他们的秋装系列。

sentences.en: He was elected judge in the autumn of 1991.
House prices could perk up during the autumn.
leaves with red and gold autumn tints
sentences.cn: 金秋时节略呈红黄色的树叶

sentences.en: Right now we are in the changeover period between autumn and winter.
sentences.cn: 眼下，我们正处于秋冬交替的时候。

sentences.en: See our selection of autumn favourites and take your pick.
sentences.cn: 看看我们的秋季精选，然后挑出你想要的。

sentences.en: The court case got under way last autumn.
sentences.cn: 这个案子从去年秋天起开始审理。

sentences.en: The critics rhapsodized over her perfor-mance in "Autumn Sonata"
sentences.cn: 评论家对于她在电影《秋日奏鸣曲》中的表演大加赞赏。

sentences.en: The fall of one leaf is enough to tell coming of autumn.
This autumn's collections are a very mixed bag.
sentences.cn: 今年秋装系列风格迥异。

sentences.en: This could be the feel-good movie of the autumn.
sentences.cn: 这可以称得上是今秋令人赏心悦目的影片了。

sentences.en: Two thousand grey seal pups are born there every autumn.
sentences.cn: 那里每年秋天有2,000头灰色小海豹出生。

sentences.en: We are always plagued by wasps in autumn.
sentences.cn: 每年秋天，我们这里总是黄蜂成灾。

trans.tran_en: the season between summer and winter, when leaves change colour and the weather becomes cooler
the season between summer and winter, when leaves change colour and the weather becomes cooler
